title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\BatchDmlResult
name: BatchDmlResult
description: Represents the result of a Batch DML operation.

params.name: errorStatement
params.description: The statement (with params and types) which triggered an error.

methods.name: rowCounts
methods.description: Get a list of integers indicating the number of modified rows for each successful statement.

methods.name: error
methods.description:
Get a Batch DML error, if one exists.

If an error occurred, the method returns an array, where the status key contains error information, represented as google.rpc.Status, and the 'statement` key contains the input which caused the error.

If no error occurred, this method returns null.
